mapper.sql:
select aply.goods_no, aply.item_no, aply.orr_cnt, aply.orr_at, aply.sale_prc, aply.prm_prc, aply.applied_cpn_iss_no, ci.prm_no, ci.prm_nm, ci.dc_ccd, ci.dc_val, ci.min_pur_amt, ci.max_dc_amt, ci.cpn_kind_cd, ci.degr_ccd, iss.cpn_iss_no, case when aply.applied_cpn_iss_no = iss.cpn_iss_no then 'Y' else 'N' end applying_yn from cup_info ci inner join aply on ci.prm_no = aply.prm_no left join cc_cpn_issue iss on aply.prm_no = iss.prm_no and iss.mbr_no = #{mbrNo} where 1 = 1 and ((ci.prm_priod_ccd = '10' and ci.prm_end_dt > now()) or (ci.prm_priod_ccd = '20' and iss.sys_mod_dtime + ci.prm_std_dd * interval '1 day' > now()) ) and ci.prm_kind_cd = #{prmKindCd} and ci.cpn_kind_cd = #{cpnKindCd}
and iss.cpn_iss_no is not null and iss.cpn_use_dt is null
mapper.select: and ci.min_pur_amt <= coalesce(aply.orr_at, 0) order by aply.orr_at desc, aply.applied_cpn_iss_no nulls last, aply.goods_no, aply.item_no
